page.title: 09LANDSCAPE/BUILDINGS.Headcorn
page.content: Contrasing styles in building make the Houses in this area worth recording. A few select modern homes alongside old {Weatherboarded Cottages;}neat little Bungalows and some older dwellings set back from the road,forms the built-up S-W corner of this block.In the less populated countryside,old mellow Farm- houses with Oak beams, or the upper half hung with tiles, have been care- fully renovated.Cottages are built of {Brick}or{Stone,}some faced with White Weatherboards;others are Timber-framed and many have roofs of{Kent"Peg"tiles. The few Mobile Homes allowed must con- form to regulations set by the Borough and Parish Council.The most intriguing buildings however, are the{Oast Houses It has become the latest fashion to reconstruct these redundant Hop Kilns into very attractive dwellings.
